Content:: Arturo Alessandri Besa (31 October 1923 – 13 July 2022)[1] was a Chilean lawyer and politician.[2] Alessandri was member of his country's Chamber of Deputies and also of the Senate; he also was candidate for the presidency of Chile in the 1993 elections.[3] He was the grandson of Arturo Alessandri Palma and the nephew of Jorge Alessandri, both presidents of Chile. Besa died on 13 July 2022 at the age of 98.  This article about a Chilean politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
